alert.note: Alert for Inland Calhoun; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:35PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun and southwestern Victoria Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 335 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Guadalupe, or near Victoria, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, McFaddin, Guadalupe, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Dacosta, Wood Hi, Bloomington, Victoria Riverside Park, Placedo, Victoria College, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Victoria Regional Airport and Downtown Victoria. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 632 and 644. US Highway 77 between mile markers 586 and 598. US Highway 87 between mile markers 810 and 824. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
